entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gull Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:59 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Becoming sunny in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
